Issue.creator: jjjjibm
Issue.summary: node-SDK Headless test fails when not ran from the project root folder
Issue.description: (/home/ibmadmin/work/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-node/node_modules/tape-promise/index.es5.js:21:13) ... I have captured the output of export and attached it to this issue. How to recreate: 1.Build fabric, fabric-cop, and fabric-sdk-node, at the commit levels I specify 2. cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-node/test/unit 3.node headless.js >
